Second Canto - The Cosmic Manifestation

<body class="rust">
    <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var path_to_root = "";
        var default_theme = "rust";
    </script>

    <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        try {
            var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
            var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

            if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
            }

            if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
            }
        } catch (e) { }
    </script>

    <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var theme;
        try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
        if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
        document.body.className = theme;
        document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
    </script>

    <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var html = document.querySelector('html');
        var sidebar = 'hidden';
        if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
            try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
            sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
        }
        html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
        html.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
    </script>

            <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
            <script type="text/javascript">
                document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                    link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                });
            </script>

<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->

var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

        if (theme.startsWith('&quot;') &amp;&amp; theme.endsWith('&quot;')) {
            localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
        }

        if (sidebar.startsWith('&quot;') &amp;&amp; sidebar.endsWith('&quot;')) {
            localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
        }
    } catch (e) { }
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    var theme;
    try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
    if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
    document.body.className = theme;
    document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    var html = document.querySelector('html');
    var sidebar = 'hidden';
    if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
        try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
        sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
    }
    html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
    html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

                &lt;h1 class=&quot;menu-title&quot;&gt;Third Canto - The Status Quo&lt;/h1&gt;

                &lt;div class=&quot;right-buttons&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;a href=&quot;print.html&quot; title=&quot;Print this book&quot; aria-label=&quot;Print this book&quot;&gt;
                        &lt;i id=&quot;print-button&quot; class=&quot;fa fa-print&quot;&gt;&lt;/i&gt;

        &lt;div id=&quot;search-wrapper&quot; class=&quot;hidden&quot;&gt;
            &lt;form id=&quot;searchbar-outer&quot; class=&quot;searchbar-outer&quot;&gt;
                &lt;input type=&quot;search&quot; name=&quot;search&quot; id=&quot;searchbar&quot; name=&quot;searchbar&quot; placeholder=&quot;Search this book ...&quot; aria-controls=&quot;searchresults-outer&quot; aria-describedby=&quot;searchresults-header&quot;&gt;
            &lt;/form&gt;
            &lt;div id=&quot;searchresults-outer&quot; class=&quot;searchresults-outer hidden&quot;&gt;
                &lt;div id=&quot;searchresults-header&quot; class=&quot;searchresults-header&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
                &lt;ul id=&quot;searchresults&quot;&gt;
                &lt;/ul&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
        

        &lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&gt;
        &lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
            document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
            document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
            Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
            });
        &lt;/script&gt;

        &lt;div id=&quot;content&quot; class=&quot;content&quot;&gt;
            &lt;main&gt;
                &lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&gt;

Home - Second Canto - The Cosmic Manifestation 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

    if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
    }
} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;

<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
            
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            
        &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;First Canto - Creation&amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt;
            
        &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
    });
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search.     &amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;Ninth Canto - Liberation&amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;gt;

    &amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;

The Dynasty of Amsuman&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; The Pastimes of the Supreme Lord, Ramacandra&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Ramacandra Rules the World&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Kusa, the Son of Lord Ramacandra&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Maharaja Nimi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; King Pururava Enchanted by Urvasi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; Parasurama, the Lord’s Warrior Incarnation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Parasurama Destroys the World’s Ruling Class&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasties of the Sons of Pururava&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; King Yayati Regains His Youth&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; King Yayati Achieves Liberation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Puru&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descendants of Ajamidha&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasties of the Sons of Yayati&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; Krsna, the Supreme Personality of Godhead&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

(Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Ninth Canto - Liberation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;

<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

The Dynasty of Maharaja Nimi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; King Pururava Enchanted by Urvasi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; Parasurama, the Lord’s Warrior Incarnation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Parasurama Destroys the World’s Ruling Class&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasties of the Sons of Pururava&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; King Yayati Regains His Youth&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; King Yayati Achieves Liberation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Puru&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasty of Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descendants of Ajamidha&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; The Dynasties of the Sons of Yayati&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; Krsna, the Supreme Personality of Godhea&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Ninth Canto - Liberation&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Eighth Canto - Withdrawal of the Cosmic Creations&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Seventh Canto - The Science of God 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Prahlada Pacifies Lord Nrsimhadeva with Prayers&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; Prahlada, the Best Among Exalted Devotees&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; The Perfect Society: Four Social Classes&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; The Perfect Society: Four Spiritual Classes&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; The Behavior of a Perfect Person&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; Ideal Family Life&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt;         &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Seventh Canto - The Science of God&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');

link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});

&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Sixth Canto - Prescribed Duties for Mankind 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Yamaraja Instructs His Messengers&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;4/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;4.&lt;/strong&gt; The Hamsa-guhya Prayers Offered to the Lord by Prajapati Daksa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;5/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;5.&lt;/strong&gt; Narada Muni Cursed by Prajapati Daksa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;6/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;6.&lt;/strong&gt; The Progeny of the Daughters of Dakṣa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;7/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;7.&lt;/strong&gt; Indra Offends His Spiritual Master, Bṛhaspati&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;8/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;8.&lt;/strong&gt; The Nārāyaṇa-kavaca Shield&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;9/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;9.&lt;/strong&gt; Appearance of the Demon Vṛtrāsura&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; The Battle Between the Demigods and Vṛtrāsura&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; King Indra Afflicted by Sinful Reaction&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; King Citraketu’s Lamentation&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt;                 &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Sixth Canto - Prescribed Duties for Mankind&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus 
    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/print.css&quot; media=&quot;print&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;

The Activities of Maharaja Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;2/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of Maharaja Agnidhra&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;3/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;3.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt;
